title: Release process
description: Document and automate release steps for voxpipe (versioning, changelog, packaging, and distribution).

title: Voxpipe configuration strategy
description: Define config approach (env vars, config file, defaults, per-user overrides) for voxpipe scripts and future service.

title: Add testing
description: Define a test strategy (script/unit/integration) and add initial tests or checks for core scripts and packaging.

title: Explicit voxpipe dependencies
description: Define required system packages and runtime deps (audio stack, clipboard, whisper.cpp, openblas, etc.) and document them.

title: Model download/update support
description: Add ability to download/update whisper.cpp models, choose a default model, and document model storage/layout.

title: Bundle systemd user service for ydotool
description: Add a systemd user unit and instructions for ydotool so voice commands can inject input safely.
